MMAStrings.OnModuleLoaded: {=MoStrings1}Mo Mercenary Association has been loaded successfully. Author:{Author}, Translator:{Translator} Have a good time!
MMAStrings.ToTownOptionText: {=MoStrings2}Go to the Mo Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.TownText: {=MoStrings4}You came to the mercenary Association. You can find it in almost every settlements, except the bandits' hideout.
MMAStrings.ToCastleOptionText: {=MoStrings5}Go to the Mo Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.ToVillageOptionText: {=MoStrings8}Go to the Mo Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.ReturnToTownHallText: {=MoStrings11}Go back to the Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.ReturnToCastleHallText: {=MoStrings12}Go back to the Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.ReturnToVillageHallText: {=MoStrings13}Go back to the Mercenary Association Hall.
MMAStrings.UnableToCoverTheCost_Gold: {=MoStrings15}You can not recruit {TroopName}. You have not enough gold.
MMAStrings.UnableToCoverTheCost_Prosperity: {=MoStrings16}You can not recruit {TroopName}. {SettlementName}'s Prosperity is too low.
MMAStrings.UnableToCoverTheCost_Hearth: {=MoStrings17}You can not recruit {TroopName}. It doesn't have enough people.
MMAStrings.UnableToCoverTheCost_Militia: {=MoStrings18}You can not recruit {TroopName}. Number of {SettlementName}'s Militia is too less.
MMAStrings.UnableToCoverTheCost_Renown: {=MoStrings19}You can not recruit {TroopName}. You have not enough renown.
MMAStrings.UnusableCondition_Hearth: {=MoStrings22}{SettlementName} is not a village or you are not the owner of it.
MMAStrings.UnusableCondition_Militia: {=MoStrings23}Number of {SettlementName}'s Militia is too less, so that the lord of {SettlementName} will not allow they leave party.
